title: The Revealing
description: It’s been nearly a year since my life was turned upside down. The realm, my new home, is full of vampires, shifters, slashers, rage demons and of course the Valkyries. We are all just pawns in a giant chest game played by the gods. Every day is another chance to test fate, to be sent to a final death and I revel in it. I’m Kylie Daniels and my response to the gods of this realm, bring it!Kylie Daniels is now one of the Five, the most powerful Valkyrie group in the realm. But more is required of her than she ever thought possible, as the prophecy orchestrated by the gods is revealed. Kylie must accept and prepare for her fate, for the existence of the world may rest upon her young shoulders.
author: K.A. Young
